thread.title: Watch Radiohead Play Live Rarity “The Tourist” And Accidentally Pump In Bruno Mars At Miami Tour Opener
thread.title_full: Watch Radiohead Play Live Rarity “The Tourist” And Accidentally Pump In Bruno Mars At Miami Tour Opener

author: Stereogum
title: Watch Radiohead Play Live Rarity “The Tourist” And Accidentally Pump In Bruno Mars At Miami Tour Opener
text: Last night, Radiohead played the first date of their short North American spring tour at Miami's American Airlines Arena. And during the show, they did something they haven't done in eight years. They played "The Tourist," the OK Computer deep cut, live. As always, it's cool to hear the heads in the crowd react … More »
